channel.title: Posts on John Inman
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on John Inman

item.title: MODIS Fog Map
item.description: Summary: In this series we are exploring the relationship between fogginess and home prices in the city of Seaside, California, using remotely sensed data and online home price estimates. Part 1 describes accessing and processing MODIS satellite data to create a 250-meter resolution fog frequency map. Had I been slightly more ambitious I would have doubled by sample size by downloading MYD35 as well.
